item.description:
Breaking Through the Illusions and Creating Your Own Miracles

Breaking Through the Illusions and Creating Your Own Miracles

When: Saturday, Jan 26, from 9 am- 5:30 pm and Sunday, Jan 27
from 9 am - 5pm
Where: The Theosophical Society in Boston
21 Maple Street
Arlington, MA 02476

Fee: $130 prepaid / $160 at the door -for both days (This a member's discounted fee)
Breaking Through the Illusions and Creating Your Own Miracles

Note: This can be taken as a single day.  Contact us for detailed information of each day.
(Partial scholarships available - No one turned away)
Contact Kevin Martin @ 978-494-4542 / kenda_assoc@msn.com or contact Barry Harris @ 857-600-5247 / barrymh2002@yahoo.com for further details about scholarships.
See what past participants are saying -

  • "Thorough presentation by both speakers explaining the roots of our life problems with scientific backup information. I very much enjoyed the exercises....Topics well selected that enrich, empower and enlighten." - Mina
  • "Very powerful ideas with lots of research and proof" – Steve
  • "Wow. It was really mind opening. Great to be able to connect the spirituality with our awareness of the experience of our consciousness. I enjoyed the fact that the two teachers were able to connect two different subjects, (ie quantum physics, and NLP) so expertly." – Pam
  • "I came to the workshop a hardnosed sceptic, suspicious of New Age claims about our true powers, and I left a believer. Thank you so much for all the thought, love, and hard work it took to put together this powerful, wonderful workshop." – Robert
  • "This workshop has gone a long way to ending my victim mentality." - Dianna and Har


In this powerful two day seminar you will learn some of the exciting things that quantum physics tells us about life, health, and spirituality.
You will come to understand what is real and what illusionary in your life. You will also learn concepts and techniques about how to start taking control of your life.
This unique program combines concepts of Neuro-Linguistic Programming (NLP), Ho’oponopono (Hawaiian process of forgiveness and grace) and the latest discoveries in quantum physics.

In this seminar you will learn:
• The truth about Mysticism
• How we create our own experience
• How our actions affect others and the world we perceive
• How to change/control your mindset, attitude, and your state of mind
• How we perceive the world – What reality is really?
• How to ‘clear’ the illusions we have of the world
• How to see your limitations and ‘blow them away’
• How to create miracles in your own life
• How forgiveness plays a vital role in your own well being
• You will discover how to find abundance in many areas of your live
• To bring a new awareness into your life that will stay with you forever

group.name: The Greater Boston NLP and Hypnosis Meetup Group

item.name: Arlington Weekend Seminar - Breaking Through the Illusions
